title: Fri Post Show (03-25-22)
itunes:title: Fri Post Show (03-25-22)
description:
Bobby starts by talking about how he can’t believe how fast this year is going by. There was a student left at a Zoo during a school field trip. 48 year old identical twins are receiving heart transplants 6 months apart. Why experts say you should only check your email 2x times a day. Bobby talks more about the Arkansas basketball game and win last night. Bobby gets into why he thinks people are always against him. We get into a weird conversation about testicles and male birth control…

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
